name: customer-support-chat-widget
description: Simple customer service chat widget with session persistence for React + TypeScript

scripts.start: npm run build && npm --prefix example run dev -- --port 5173 --strictPort
scripts.start:preview: npm run build && npm --prefix example run build && npm --prefix example run preview -- --port 4173 --strictPort
scripts.db:up: docker inspect chatbot1-pg >NUL 2>&1 && docker start chatbot1-pg || docker run -d --name chatbot1-pg -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=chatpass -e POSTGRES_DB=chatbot1 -p 5432:5432 postgres:16-alpine
scripts.dev:all: npm run build && concurrently -n db,web -c cyan,green "docker compose up" "npm --prefix example run dev -- --port 5173 --strictPort"
